law.catch_line: Annual report on implementation of pilot projects instituted pursuant to KRS 196.731.
law.text: The Kentucky State Corrections Commission shall submit an annual report on the implementation and results of any pilot projects developed pursuant to KRS 196.731 to the Legislative Research Commission, the Chief Justice, and the Governor on or before September 1 of each year. The report shall also include the calculations made pursuant to KRS 196.731 and the resulting performance incentive funding appropriated, if any.
law.history: Created 2011 Ky. Acts ch.2, sec.73, effective June 8, 2011.
